ValidationRule.description: This field is only editable by System Administrators and Finance for Customer and Former Customer and Partner Customer records.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator", $Profile.Name <>"PF Finance", ISCHANGED( PO_Required__c ) ,
OR( TEXT( Type )="Former Customer", TEXT( Type )="Customer", TEXT( Subtype__c )="Partner" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: PO Required field is only editable by System Administrators and Finance for Customer and Former Customer Account Type and Partner subtype
